title: Action Music Pack - Volume 1
description: A pack of 9 themes, loops and stems of ACTION-themed audio delights!
longDescription:
Perfect for anything requiring an ACTION feel, a mixture of percussive, epic and driving themes. With heavy percussion, guitars and electronics prevalent through many tracks, this pack is perfect for anything from spies to modern warfare, stealthy to assault. Each theme comes with loops and loopable stems for in-game adaptive experimentation...


*** This pack is also included in the Mighty MUSIC MEGA PACK - Volume 1 along with eleven other albums and assorted goodies at an amazing discounted price. Click HERE to check it out! ***


Please feel free to let me know about your project if it features my music so I can share and promote your game.


The ACTION Music Pack - Volume 1 by Ethan Lewis Maltby is a varied selection of energetic and epic themes. With plenty of tension and a little bit of release, each two minute plus theme can be used in-game or as menu music. There are shorter loops as well as loopable stems for in-game action; mix and match each set of stems to create your own unique soundtrack!


ACTION MUSIC PACK - Overview


- NINE main full tracks of intense, action themes: LISTEN HERE

- NINE sets of stems based off each theme which can be used for creating an adaptive score. Hear an example of how these stems are broken down HERE


MAIN THEMES [each comes with a short loopable version + stems]

1 - Dark, Plotting, Tense - [02:13]

2 - Aggressive, Cool, Modern - [02:05]

3 - Very Dark, Pulsing, Tense - [02:05]

4 - Upbeat, Building, Heroic - [02:27]

5 - Chaotic, Bond-y, Guitar - [02:24]

6 - Slow, Tense, Action-y - [02:30]

7 - Upbeat, Quick, Spy - [02:24]

8 -Pulsing, Tense, Dark - [02:24]

9 - Percussive, Fast, Explosive - [02:27]
technicalDetails:
Features:

- All themes are FULLY LOOPABLE for total flexibility

- 20 Minutes of Fully Mastered themes ready for import

- THREE stems per loop to build each track plus an ENDING sting

- NINE shorter loops based on the themes for no hassle in-game use

- Professional Quality wav files, 16bit/44.1khz

- Composed and Produced by a musician with two decades of professional experience in Film, TV, Sporting Events and Theatre.


Number of Audio Wavs: 54

Number of Audio Cues: 54

Sample rate / bit rate: 16bit/44.1khz

Does music loop: (Yes)

Minutes of audio provided: 30:37

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)

Additional Notes:

Please do let me know if you use my work on any of your games so I can share and promote.

For any questions, enquiries or if you are interested in collaborations or commissions, please feel free to contact me and for more information about my work, please visit my website.
